StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SET_SP_DBA_PERMISSIONS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProcName sysname=NULL, @SQLUser varchar(20)
AS --- DECLARE @ProcName as varchar(100) DECLARE @SQLString varchar(100)
--- IF NO PROCEDURE NAME IS PASSED IN, LOOP THROUGH AND GRANT EXECUTE PERMISSIONS ON ALL --- STORED PROCEDURES AND USER-DEFINED FUNCTIONS BEGIN DECLARE sproc_Cursor CURSOR FOR SELECT NAME FROM SYSOBJECTS WHERE (NAME LIKE 'SP_DBA%' AND XTYPE = 'P')
OPEN sproc_Cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @ProcName
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN --- SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @ProcName + '] TO [MCRISS]' --- EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON ' + @ProcName + ' TO ' + @SQLUser EXEC (@SQLString)
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @ProcName END
CLOSE sproc_Cursor DEALLOCATE sproc_Cursor END
